## Modpack Version

Specify the version of the modpack where the bug was encountered (e.g., 1.0.3).

## Describe the Bug

Provide a concise description of the issue.

## Steps to Reproduce (if needed)

List the steps required to reproduce the issue (if needed):

1. Step one
2. Step two
3. ...

## Logs (if needed)

Please provide your logs via [mclo.gs](https://mclo.gs):

If you suspect the issue is script-related, you may also include logs from `/kubejs/logs/`.

## Additional Information

Add any other context or screenshots that might help explain the problem.
